title: If a CA LLC currently has a cancelled status, does it still owe back the $800 minimum fees for past years?
question: Defunct LLC with no assets
answers:
If the LLC is to be reinstated all back taxes and filings must be done. But only the LLC is liable for those fees. Does the LLC have any money? Were accounts opened? If so , those assets should go to the state.
If no assets were owned by the entity, then for preactical purposes the Secretary of State has already "dissolved" the LLC. So why would you want to deal with it or pay its debts?

Yes. But the members are not liable.

Hope this helps!
Phillip M. Smith Jr.
